name: Hangman (itch) (RenderTechUK)
description:
A hangman game developed in C# using Windows Forms.

Developed as part of a pursuit to learn additional functionality within the C# language such as string building and reading from external files.

The files used to generate the words and hints are stored in the following directory

"Downloaded Zip file\Application Files\Hangman by RenderTechnician_1_0_0_5\"

Words.txt.deploy controls the words selectable.

Hints.txt.deploy controls the hint for each word

Right click on the file and open it with Notepad, this should make it fully editable.

All donations are greatly appreciated.
